description: 100 multiple-choice questions derived from WCFD-OVER Training Guide (concept-based; excludes exercises/knowledge checks).

questions.text: What is the primary purpose of PLM in an organization?
options: Manage the complete journey of a product and make accurate data available across teams
Provide email services for engineering teams
Replace ERP and CRM systems entirely

questions.text: Which statement describes the 'digital thread' in PLM?
options: Digital tools and representations connecting design, evaluation, and lifecycle data
Manual paper-based routing of change notices

questions.text: Which lifecycle stages typically appear in product development?
Why does PLM emphasize organizing diverse data sources?
options: Complex products generate multi-format data that must be controlled and accessed reliably
To minimize storage and delete history

questions.text: What role does Windchill play in PLM?
options: Backbone that organizes, stores, and provides access to product data

questions.text: Which kinds of product data are examples mentioned in the guide?
Which three main sections comprise the Windchill UI?
What does the Quick Links menu provide?
options: Access to Help, preferences, job monitors, clipboard, and useful utilities

questions.text: What are the two tabs in the Navigator panel?
Which option in Navigator Browse lists recently accessed contexts?
What is a Product context used for?
options: Storage for information related to a specific product or deliverable

questions.text: What is a Library context used for?
options: Shared information across the organization (templates, standards)

questions.text: Which links appear under a context node (e.g., Product)?
options: Details, Folders, Workspaces, Packages, Team, Tasks, Change Monitor, Discussions, Reports

questions.text: Which Change options are accessible in Navigator?
options: Issues, Variances, Change Requests, Change Notices, Change Monitor, Reports

questions.text: What is an Information page in Windchill?
options: Central page to view object details, history, related items, and perform actions

questions.text: Which areas are consistent on Information pages?
options: Top area (name, number, version, state, Actions), tabs, tables below

questions.text: Can Information pages be customized?
options: Yes—create custom tabs, select tables, and reorder elements
Only default tabs are static without any options
Only admins can lock pages permanently

questions.text: Which functional domains are covered by Windchill?
options: Data vaulting, document management, multi-CAD, process, product structure, change/configuration, visualization, project, classification, supplier, manufacturing, integration

questions.text: Which are major business objects?
Which relationship types exist?
Which change objects form the change process?
options: Problem Report, Change Request, Change Notice, Change Tasks

questions.text: How does Windchill track versions?
options: Version string with revision (letter) and iteration (number), e.g., A.1

questions.text: Why are Check Out / Check In used?
options: Prevent concurrent modification, create working copy, then store new iteration

questions.text: When is Revise used?
options: When business rules restrict editing at a state; create new revision before changes

questions.text: What is a lifecycle?
options: Defined states an object can exist in (e.g., In Work, Released, Obsolete)

questions.text: What does a workflow capture?
options: Business process routing tasks to appropriate roles

questions.text: What is the role of Team objects?
options: Set of roles used by workflows to assign tasks

questions.text: What does object history capture?
options: Version evolution and lifecycle state changes for comparison

questions.text: What is a product structure (BOM)?
options: Hierarchical set of parts with filters (version, state, view, effectivity, baseline, options)

questions.text: Which context types does Windchill PDMLink provide?
options: Products and Libraries (plus Project/Program in projects capability)

questions.text: Which attributes define an access control rule?
options: Domain, Object Type, Life Cycle State, Actor, Permissions

questions.text: Which search methods are available in Windchill?
options: Simple, Advanced, Faceted, Classification (plus Integrated from authoring tools)

questions.text: What does Simple Search depend on?
options: Object type selection and keyword criteria; may be standard or index search

questions.text: What do wildcards do in keyword search?
options: * replaces zero or more characters; ? replaces one character

questions.text: What character treatment is noted for search criteria?
options: ., -, _ are interpreted literally; other special characters removed

questions.text: What can Advanced Search add beyond keywords?
options: Type, Context, attribute Criteria (AND/OR), Related Object Search via report templates

questions.text: When do Faceted results appear?
options: With Index Search enabled, facets preference set, indexed types, no Related Object Search, iteration not set to All
Always by default with no config

questions.text: What are Saved Searches used for?
options: Store predefined criteria for repeat execution; accessed via Search History and Saved Searches

questions.text: What do Search Preferences control?
options: Enable Index Search/Facets, keyword behavior, default types, latest version, thumbnails

questions.text: How do you open a mini information page?
options: Hover over a mini-thumbnail in Search Results or Folder Contents

questions.text: What does the mini information page show on the left?
options: Larger thumbnail and basic attributes with action icons

questions.text: Which reports appear by default in mini info when navigating thumbnails?
What can Folder Contents tools do?
options: Pick a View, sort/group by columns, filter text, open mini info, create custom views

questions.text: What does 'Pick a View' provide?
options: Select predefined or custom table views and save as view

questions.text: Which column actions are available?
options: Sort ascending/descending, lock/unlock, wrap text, show/hide columns, group by field

questions.text: What steps define a new view?
options: GPU setup; storage format; BIOS options
Name/Description/visibility; Object Types; Filters; Columns; Sort order

questions.text: Where can you access the Windchill Help Center?
Which Help items are available?
options: About Windchill, Communities, Contact Documentation, Welcome, Quick Start Guide, What’s New

questions.text: Which tables can be displayed on the Home page?
options: Tasks, Updates, Checked-out Work, Packages, Workspaces, Meetings, Notebook, Subscriptions, Reports, Saved Reports, Data Monitors, Discussions, Smart Collections

questions.text: What do A.1, A.2, B.1 represent in history?
options: Iterations and revisions with lifecycle states across milestones

questions.text: When searching multiple types, what columns are available in a custom view?
options: Only attributes common among object types

questions.text: What does Text Preview column require?
options: Index search enabled and supported types preference

questions.text: What is a Data Monitor?
options: Scheduled execution of a saved report that emails when thresholds are met

questions.text: What does the Clipboard in Quick Links do?
options: Cut, copy, and paste objects/URLs within Windchill

questions.text: Which menu lets you select visible tables on Home page?
What is the Breadcrumb trail used for?
options: Display navigation hierarchy and link to contexts/folders

questions.text: Which table shows recently created or modified objects?
Which table lists items assigned to you?
Where are mini thumbnails commonly displayed?
options: Search Results and Folder Contents tables

questions.text: What is Classification search?
options: Search based on defined classifications; UI similar to Faceted

questions.text: What does 'Group By This Field' do?
options: Group table rows by selected column

questions.text: How can you save a table configuration quickly?
options: Use Pick a View > Save As View

questions.text: Which option filters Folder Contents by object type?
options: View menu next to table label

questions.text: Which Windchill capability improves visibility via dashboards and reports (item 64)?
options: Role-based wiki pages with widgets connecting to reports
Local text files with no links
